Ingredients: Spaghetti:100g; Ground Beef:500g; Tomato Sauce:1 can; Onion:1; Garlic:2 cloves; Olive Oil:2 tbsp; Salt:1 tsp; Pepper:1 tsp
Instructions: Boil spaghetti. Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil. Add ground beef and cook until browned. Add tomato sauce and simmer. Season with salt and pepper. Serve over cooked spaghetti.

Ingredients: Chicken:500g; Curry Powder:2 tbsp; Coconut Milk:1 can; Onion:1; Garlic:2 cloves; Olive Oil:2 tbsp; Salt:1 tsp; Pepper:1 tsp
Instructions: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil. Add chicken and cook until browned. Add curry powder and stir. Add coconut milk and simmer. Season with salt and pepper. Serve with rice.

Ingredients: Broccoli:1 bunch; Carrots:2; Bell Peppers:2; Soy Sauce:2 tbsp; Garlic:2 cloves; Olive Oil:2 tbsp
Instructions: Sauté garlic in olive oil. Add vegetables and stir fry until tender. Add soy sauce and stir. Serve with rice.

Ingredients: Salmon Fillets:4; Lemon:1; Dijon Mustard:2 tbsp; Honey:1 tbsp; Olive Oil:2 tbsp; Salt:1 tsp; Pepper:1 tsp
Instructions: Preheat grill. In a bowl. mix Dijon mustard. honey. olive oil. salt. and pepper. Brush the mixture over salmon fillets. Grill the salmon for about 6-8 minutes per side or until cooked through. Squeeze fresh lemon juice over the grilled salmon before serving.

Ingredients: Pizza Dough:1 ball; Tomato Sauce:1/2 cup; Fresh Mozzarella:200g; Fresh Basil:1 cup; Olive Oil:2 tbsp; Salt:1/2 tsp; Pepper:1/2 tsp
Instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C). Roll out pizza dough and spread tomato sauce evenly. Tear fresh mozzarella and scatter over the sauce. Bake in the oven until crust is golden and cheese is melted. Remove from oven. Top with fresh basil. Drizzle with olive oil. Season with salt and pepper.

Ingredients: Chicken Breast:2; Romaine Lettuce:1 head; Croutons:1 cup; Parmesan Cheese:1/2 cup; Caesar Dressing:1/4 cup
Instructions: Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Grill or cook in a pan until fully cooked. Slice the cooked chicken. In a large bowl. toss together chopped romaine lettuce. croutons. Parmesan cheese. and sliced chicken. Drizzle with Caesar dressing before serving.

Ingredients: Black Beans:1 can; Kidney Beans:1 can; Corn:1 cup; Diced Tomatoes:1 can; Onion:1; Bell Pepper:1; Garlic:2 cloves; Chili Powder:2 tbsp; Cumin:1 tbsp; Olive Oil:2 tbsp
Instructions: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil until softened. Add chopped bell pepper and cook until slightly tender. Add black beans. kidney beans. corn. diced tomatoes. chili powder. and cumin. Simmer for 20-25 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

Ingredients: Chicken Breasts:4; Spinach:2 cups; Feta Cheese:1/2 cup; Garlic:2 cloves; Olive Oil:2 tbsp; Salt:1 tsp; Pepper:1 tsp
Instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Sauté garlic in olive oil until fragrant. Add spinach and cook until wilted. Butterfly chicken breasts and stuff with sautéed spinach and crumbled feta. Season with salt and pepper. Bake in the oven until chicken is cooked through.

Ingredients: Shrimp:500g; Linguine:200g; Garlic:3 cloves; White Wine:1/2 cup; Lemon:1; Olive Oil:2 tbsp; Salt:1/2 tsp; Red Pepper Flakes:1/4 tsp; Parsley:1/4 cup
Instructions: Cook linguine according to package instructions. In a pan. sauté minced garlic in olive oil. Add shrimp and cook until pink. Pour in white wine. Add lemon juice. salt. and red pepper flakes. Toss in cooked linguine. Add chopped parsley before serving.

Ingredients: Ground Beef:500g; Taco Seasoning:2 tbsp; Tortillas:8; Lettuce:1 head; Tomato:1; Cheese:1 cup; Sour Cream:1/2 cup
Instructions: Brown ground beef in a pan. Drain excess fat. Add taco seasoning with water as per the packet instructions. Warm tortillas. Assemble tacos with seasoned beef. shredded lettuce. diced tomatoes. shredded cheese. and a dollop of sour cream.

Ingredients: Chicken Breast:2; Fettuccine Pasta:200g; Heavy Cream:1 cup; Parmesan Cheese:1 cup; Garlic:3 cloves; Butter:2 tbsp; Salt:1/2 tsp; Pepper:1/2 tsp
Instructions: Cook fettuccine pasta according to package instructions. Season chicken with salt and pepper. Cook until no longer pink. In a saucepan. melt butter and sauté minced garlic. Add heavy cream and Parmesan cheese. Stir until the cheese is melted. Toss cooked pasta and sliced chicken in the Alfredo sauce before serving.

Ingredients: Quinoa:1 cup; Cherry Tomatoes:1 cup; Cucumber:1; Red Onion:1/2; Feta Cheese:1/2 cup; Olive Oil:2 tbsp; Lemon:1; Salt:1/2 tsp; Pepper:1/2 tsp
Instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions. Allow it to cool. In a bowl. mix cooked quinoa. halved cherry tomatoes. diced cucumber. finely chopped red onion. and crumbled feta. Drizzle with olive oil. Squeeze lemon juice. Season with salt and pepper.

Ingredients: Beef Sirloin:500g; Broccoli:1 bunch; Soy Sauce:1/4 cup; Oyster Sauce:2 tbsp; Garlic:3 cloves; Ginger:1 tsp; Olive Oil:2 tbsp
Instructions: Slice beef thinly. Stir-fry in olive oil until browned. Add minced garlic and ginger. Add broccoli florets. Stir-fry until tender. Pour in soy sauce and oyster sauce. Stir until everything is well-coated. Serve over rice.

Ingredients: Tomatoes:4; Fresh Mozzarella:200g; Fresh Basil:1 cup; Balsamic Glaze:2 tbsp; Olive Oil:2 tbsp; Salt:1/2 tsp; Pepper:1/2 tsp
Instructions: Slice tomatoes and fresh mozzarella. Arrange them on a plate. alternating with fresh basil leaves.
